name: Coming Home (numreon, n3rdia, hurricaro, jele77, ewluise, peachypauli, aledz, petitepilogue)
name_original: Coming Home (numreon, n3rdia, hurricaro, jele77, ewluise, peachypauli, aledz, petitepilogue)
description:
Coming Home is a Point-And-Click-Adventure that lets you experience a selection of milestones and memories of the queer protagonist's life. Discover objects that have formed her path and brought her to where she is now. Where do you think she ends up?

Coming Home is heavily inspired by V. E. Schwab's essay about her coming out story. Find the essay here:

https://www.oprahmag.com/life/a34100214/ve-schwab-coming-out-story/

The game is a visual Point-And-Click-Adventure with background music and texts  on screen.

Coming Home was made within 2 days for a game jam.
